english_example_sentence: If you had not stopped the dangerous experiment in the laboratory, the serious accident would have occurred
russian_example_sentence: Если бы вы не остановили опасный эксперимент в лаборатории, серьезная авария бы произошла
turkish_example_sentence: Siz laboratuvarda tehlikeli deneyi durmamışsanız, ciddi kaza meydana gelirdi
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz laboratuvarda tehlikeli deneyi ______, ciddi kaza meydana gelirdi
